strapiPost.title: University Of Arkansas Among Top 40 Schools For Study Abroad Programs
strapiPost.content:
The University of Arkansas's Study Abroad Program ranked 36th in a report by Open Doors on American schools' international educational opportunities.

  • Going somewhere: The report focused on the 2020-21 school year in which the U of A sent 106 students abroad; that number grew to 904 during the 2021-22 academic year, increasing participation in study abroad programs to pre-pandemic numbers.
  • Stamping the passport: The Walton College of Business sent the most students abroad for global learning experiences in 2021-22, with the most popular destinations being Italy, Spain, the United Kingdom, Chile, and Ireland.
